text: Ente Tuition Teacher is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by NP Suresh, starring Prathapachandran and Mala Aravindan in lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/ente-tuition-teacher-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Suresh * Mala Aravindan * Prathapachandran * Y G Mahendra ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by N. P. Suresh
title: Ente Tuition Teacher
